pages.text: Well, the Halloween costume never really worked out. I seemed to scare away ever merchant I could find. I think it's the prickly stubble on my face and cold look in my eyes. I managed to find some old costumes that I guess some adults used for a party and left in the trash because they were covered in food, so I took those, but it's not

really anything I could see myself wearing. They're GREEN. As if I wasn't already sick of the colour, it's as if its following me like one of those stupid monstruos. I was thinking of maybe trying to add some other colours to it to spice it up, but for now I'm stuck wearing this hideous outfit until I can find some better clothes. My old clothes were covered in holes from what happened a few weeks

ago with the thornsplosion thing. Which by the way, I haven't done since then, so I'm thinking it was a onetime occurrence or something, which im happy with. I almost lost this journal the other day actually. I was hiding out in a dried out well that I found, and it slipped out of my pocket on my way out of the well. I left and realized about 3 hours later that I had lost it and walked all the

way back to get it. This stupid journal set me back about a day's walk. Luckily, I've noticed an increase in my speed. I've also noticed I could jump significantly higher than any normal human, which is how I got out of the well. I've taken a long enough break from walking, I should keep pushing on.
